song_name: Step In the Name of Love
lyrics:
7 contributorsstep in the name of love lyricsverse 1

a thousand years from now
well be still putting it down my baby

but the picture remains the same

be still puttin it down my baby

baby girl in other words for ever more
ill be here ill be here
cause my whole has been full of joy every since
you came heregirl

hook

because you spin me yeah spin me
and every time were done making love girl
you makes me wanna

cause my whole has been full of joy since
you came heregirl

ohh i love you thank you2embed
